ygData.subject: Re:Monk Fighting Gear for Dragons
ygData.msgSnippet: A crown of froglock kings is an absolute must (infact it is so good I use as part of my regular equipment): 12 ac, 20 fire, 20 cold. Found on the froglock king
ygData.messageBody:
A crown of froglock kings is an absolute must (infact it is so good I use as
part of my regular equipment):

12 ac, 20 fire, 20 cold.
Found on the froglock king in Lower Guk.(common drop)


____________________Reply Separator____________________
Subject: [EQ-Monks] Monk Fighting Gear for Dragons
Author: "Lombard.Mikhael" <Mikhael_Lombard@...>
Date: 01/26/2000 9:40 AM

From: "Lombard.Mikhael" <Mikhael_Lombard@...>

Hi all, being around the level that dragon raids are attempted and such, I
realized that I don't have any resistance gear and such to fight them, I was
wondering if anyone had a nice little list of good dragon fighting equipment
and such. I am looking forward to going out there and kicking butt! Thanks.
